title: World War I Armistice Signed
summary: At 11 AM on November 11, 1918 — the eleventh hour of the eleventh day of the eleventh month — the armistice ending World War I came into effect. After four years of devastating trench warfare that killed over 17 million people, the guns fell silent on the Western Front. The armistice ended the Great War but planted seeds of resentment that would lead to World War II two decades later.
